name: the bugroom
description:
The BugRoom
This game is made by the developer accident ... the code is error, and we are out of disk space after this ...


= JUST =
Just kidding =D, this game we made to practice our skills with our new game engine, and maybe this is the last one for several reasons.

= IF =
if your computer processor are under 2.50 ghz & your ram under 4gb, please don't play this game ... i sriously please, this will broke your pc :D, if you want play this game, you must play in 3 ++ GHZ processor and 6++ gb ram...= Support us =If you want to support us from developer YapGamedev, follow us on itch.io, and if you like our free games on itch.io, donate as much as you want =D, don't hesitate to donate us, because 1 donate from you = 1000 % cheers for us!.
